about_the_game:
Fast-Ball is a game that's all about the balls. Roll them, race them, upgrade them. This game features third-person controls with a wide view and beautiful low-poly landscapes.

Mouse and keyboard or gamepad controls.

Race the clock. Each level has a time to beat for gold, silver, or bronze, which can be used to upgrade the speed, braking power, and turning power, which will improve the overall performance of your balls. Or you can forget about the medals and play each level at your own pace.

Solve the puzzles. Some boards require all-out speed. But many of them have physics-based puzzles for you to solve with your ball. Push, roll, and jump your way to getting to that coveted glowing gold ball.

Fast-Ball is a game for all ages.
